t: Dometic Aquires SeaStar Solutions | Sierraparts United States
s: ELKHART, Ind. – Jan. 28, 2017 – I am pleased to inform you that on November 21, Dometic entered into an agreement to acquire SeaStar Solutions. The acquisition is an excellent strategic fit and is a cornerstone in our ambition to build a broader global leadership in the marine business.
